# prvi
set key inside top right
set xrange [-8:10]

set xlabel 'x'
set ylabel 'y'
# set title 'Some Data'
plot  1 / (1 + (abs(x - 2))) title "s = 1", 1 / (1 + (abs(x - 2) / 0.25)) title "s = 0.25", 1 / (1 + (abs(x - 2) / 4)) title "s = 4"
